hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: Ablution water and tooth-stick were placed by the side of the Prophet (ﷺ). When he got up during the night (for prayer), he relieved himself, then he used the tooth-stick

chapter.ara-name: باب السِّوَاكِ لِمَنْ قَامَ مِنَ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Using The Siwak When Praying The (Voluntary) Night Prayer
